concept.title: Campaign Viewing Preferences
concept.shortdesc: When you create a new account, the hosts groups do not permit anyone to view unapproved campaigns. You may override this for any host group, except the default host group (usually the live production host). Only approved campaigns may be viewed from the default host group.

p.note: Never allow unapproved campaigns to be viewed for any public host.

conbody.p: To access the viewing preferences, select Manage Hosts from the mbox menu, then click Edit for the Staging or Development groups.
